properties.description: To extract plan view datasets from OMP Blob storage to KHC Azure blob and from there  to SFK

activities.name: LU-OMP_Extract_Metadata
activities.description: Look-up activity to get metadata for OMP Planview data.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from dbo.khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = 'omp' and active_ind = 'y' and dataset_group in ('omp_planview','omp_planview_sop','omp_constrained_forecast')

activities.name: ForEach-OMP_Extract_And_Archive
activities.description: For Each loop to extract and archive the OMP planview data from OMP ADLS to KHC ADLS.

activities.name: Get Metadata - to check the entries
activities.description: Metadata activity to check for the files availability

activities.name: If file exist - copy
activities.description: If file exists then OMP planview data is extracted and archived from OMP ADLS to KHC ADLS.

dependsOn.activity: Get Metadata - to check the entries

ifTrueActivities.name: CP-PlanviewFiles_ExtractedFrom_OMP
ifTrueActivities.description: Data extraction from OMP to KHC

ifTrueActivities.name: Audit_Log_OMP_Data_Extraction_Success
ifTrueActivities.description: Stored procedure to logs success of OMP planview data extraction in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: Audit_Log_OMP_Files_Archive_Success
ifTrueActivities.description: Stored procedure to logs success of  OMP Planview data archiving in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: Audit_Log_OMP_Files_Archive_Failure
ifTrueActivities.description: Stored procedure to logs failure of  OMP Planview data archiving in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: Audit_Log_OMP_Data_Extraction_Failure
ifTrueActivities.description: Stored procedure to logs failure of OMP planview data extraction in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: If Condition- check if exists
activities.description: Check if all different files are extracted and exists to process SFK ingestion

ifTrueActivities.name: Append dataset_group
ifTrueActivities.description: appends the dataset group of the existed files

activities.name: Audit_Log_Data_Extraction_and_Archival_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of  Data Extract and Archival in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Audit_Log_Data_Extraction_and_Archiva_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of  Data Extract and Archival in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart_Extract_intial
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs the running status for the pipeline khc_audit_log table

activities.name: SP-PipelineFailed_Master
activities.description: Stored procedure for logging failed pipeline execution.

activities.name: SP-PipelineSuccess_Master
activities.description: Stored procedure for logging successful pipeline execution.

activities.name: Failure_Notification
activities.description: Email notification to stakeholders on failed pipeline execution.

body.value:
{ "subject": "Azure Data Factory - OMP to SFK Planview files data load â€“ Failure", "body": "Hi,
OMP Planview files data load to Snowflake is Failed

Thanks & Regards,
KHC DE Team", "to_email": "@{if(equals(pipeline().globalParameters.AZURE_ENV,'PROD'),'lucas.koster@kraftheinz.com;daniel.fiems@kraftheinz.com;Richard.Storey@kraftheinz.com;Process.mining@kraftheinz.com;dl_cloud_dataops_ent_func@kraftheinz.com','afifareshma.shaik@kraftheinz.com')}", "cc_email": "@{if(equals(pipeline().globalParameters.AZURE_ENV,'PROD'),'umasankar.avadhanula@kraftheinz.com;afifareshma.shaik@kraftheinz.com','umasankar.avadhanula@kraftheinz.com')}", "importance": "High" }

activities.name: Audit_Log_LU_OMP_Planview_Metadata_Failure
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs failure of  OMP Metadata extraction in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Audit_Log_LU_OMP_Planview_Metadata_Success
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs success of  OMP Metadata extraction in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: DL-Staged_OMP_PlanviewFiles
activities.description: Delete all OMP Planview files from KHC staging folder to avoid piling up of data files because OMP planview files are stored with DATE as a suffix in the file name and hence files are not updated but a new files is created everyday while data extraction.

activities.name: Audit_Log_Delete_OMP_PlanviewFiles_Failure
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs failure of  OMP planview file deletion in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Audit_Log_Delete_OMP_PlanviewFiles_Success
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs success status of  OMP planview file deletion in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: LU-JDA_Extract_Metadata
activities.description: Look-up activity to get metadata for OMP forecast data.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from dbo.khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = 'omp' and active_ind = 'y' and dataset_group = 'omp_constrained_forecast'
and dataset_name = 'ConstrainedForecast'

activities.name: ForEach - dataset_group
activities.description: For each loop to perform SFK ingestion and  dbt processing for the existing files

activities.name: EP-SnowflakeIngestion
activities.description: Pipeline for Snowflake ingestion

activities.name: EP-DBTProcessing
activities.description: to ingest data from snowflake raw tables to final tables by appending the load_date_time column to the tables

activities.name: Audit_Log_Snowflake_Ingession_Success
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs success Snowflake data ingestion in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Audit_Log_Snowflake_Ingession_Failure
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs failure Snowflake data ingestion in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Audit_Log_DBT_Processing_Success
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs success of  DBT Processing in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Audit_Log_DBT_Processing_Failure
activities.description: Stored procedure to logs failure of  DBT Processing in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: If dataset group exist
activities.description: Checks for the files under particular dataset group existence and extraction process continues

ifTrueActivities.name: CP-Forecastfile_Pushto_JDA
ifTrueActivities.description: Data extraction from Azure blob to JDA

activities.name: If Condition - for planview files check
activities.description: If condition to check for the planview files existence

ifFalseActivities.name: Failure_Notification - Planview files
ifFalseActivities.description: Email notification for pipeline failure of planview files

body.value:
{ "subject": "Azure Data Factory - OMP to SFK Planview files - Missing in Source", "body": "Hi,
OMP Planview files are missing since the files are not available in OMP Blob

Thanks & Regards,
KHC DE Team", "to_email": "@{if(equals(pipeline().globalParameters.AZURE_ENV,'PROD'),'lucas.koster@kraftheinz.com;hilary.musaringo@kraftheinz.com;Richard.Storey@kraftheinz.com;Process.mining@kraftheinz.com;dl_cloud_dataops_ent_func@kraftheinz.com','afifareshma.shaik@kraftheinz.com')}", "cc_email": "@{if(equals(pipeline().globalParameters.AZURE_ENV,'PROD'),'umasankar.avadhanula@kraftheinz.com;afifareshma.shaik@kraftheinz.com','umasankar.avadhanula@kraftheinz.com')}", "importance": "High" }
